displayName: Microsoft Sentinel Audit Event ASim schema
description: The Microsoft Sentinel audit events normalized table stores events using the Audit Event ASIM normalized schema associated with the audit trail of information systems.
icmTeam: Microsoft Azure Sentinel/Data Collection and Processing

tables.name: ASimAuditEventLogs
tables.description: Microsoft Sentinel normalized audit events table. Stores events associated with the audit trail of information systems and audit trail logs system configuration activities and policy changes. Such changes are often performed by system administrators, but can also be performed by users when configuring the settings of their own applications.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) reflecting the time in which the event was generated.

columns.name: AdditionalFields
columns.description: Additional information, represented using key/value pairs provided by the source which do not map to ASim.

columns.name: EventMessage
columns.description: A general message or description.

columns.name: EventCount
columns.description: The number of events described by the record.

columns.name: EventStartTime
columns.description: The time (UTC) in which the event started. If the source supports aggregation and the record represents multiple events, the time that the first event was generated. If not provided by the source record, this field aliases the TimeGenerated field.

columns.name: EventEndTime
columns.description: The time (UTC) in which the event ended. If the source supports aggregation and the record represents multiple events, the time that the last event was generated. If not provided by the source record, this field aliases the TimeGenerated field.

columns.name: EventType
columns.description: Describes the operation reported by the record

columns.name: EventSubType
columns.description: Describes a subdivision of the operation reported in the EventType field.

columns.name: EventResult
columns.description: The outcome of the event, represented by one of the following values: Success, Partial, Failure, NA (Not Applicable). The value may not be provided directly by the sources, in which case it is derived from other event fields, for example, the EventResultDetails field.

columns.name: EventResultDetails
columns.description: Reason or details for the result reported in the EventResult field.

columns.name: EventOriginalUid
columns.description: A unique ID of the original record, if provided by the source.

columns.name: EventOriginalType
columns.description: The original event type or ID, if provided by the source.

columns.name: EventOriginalSubType
columns.description: The original event subtype or ID, if provided by the source.

columns.name: EventOriginalResultDetails
columns.description: The original result details provided by the source.

columns.name: EventSeverity
columns.description: The severity of the event. Valid values are: Informational, Low, Medium, or High.

columns.name: EventOriginalSeverity
columns.description: The original severity as provided by the reporting device.

columns.name: EventProduct
columns.description: The product generating the event.

columns.name: EventProductVersion
columns.description: The version of the product generating the event.

columns.name: EventVendor
columns.description: The vendor of the product generating the event.

columns.name: EventSchemaVersion
columns.description: The version of the schema.

columns.name: EventOwner
columns.description: The owner of the event, which is usually the department or subsidiary in which it was generated.

columns.name: EventReportUrl
columns.description: A URL provided in the event for a resource that provides more information about the event.

columns.name: RuleName
columns.description: The name or ID of the rule associated with the inspection results.

columns.name: RuleNumber
columns.description: The number of the rule associated with the inspection results.

columns.name: ThreatId
columns.description: The ID of the threat or malware identified in the audit activity.

columns.name: ThreatName
columns.description: The name of the threat or malware identified in the audit activity.

columns.name: ThreatCategory
columns.description: The category of the threat or malware identified in audit activity.

columns.name: ThreatRiskLevel
columns.description: The risk level associated with the identified threat. The level should be a number between 0 and 100.

columns.name: ThreatOriginalRiskLevel
columns.description: The risk level as reported by the reporting device.

columns.name: ThreatConfidence
columns.description: The confidence level of the threat identified, normalized to a value between 0 and a 100.

columns.name: ThreatOriginalConfidence
columns.description: The original confidence level of the threat identified, as reported by the reporting device.

columns.name: ThreatIsActive
columns.description: True if the threat identified is considered an active threat.

columns.name: ThreatFirstReportedTime
columns.description: The first time the IP address or domain were identified as a threat.

columns.name: ThreatLastReportedTime
columns.description: The last time the IP address or domain were identified as a threat.

columns.name: ThreatField
columns.description: The field for which a threat was identified.

columns.name: ThreatIpAddr
columns.description: An IP address or Domain for which a threat was identified.

columns.name: DvcIpAddr
columns.description: The IP Address of the device reporting the event.

columns.name: DvcHostname
columns.description: The hostname of the device reporting the event.

columns.name: DvcDomain
columns.description: The domain of the device reporting the event.

columns.name: DvcDomainType
columns.description: The type of DvcDomain.

columns.name: DvcFQDN
columns.description: The hostname of the device on which the event occurred or which reported the event.

columns.name: DvcDescription
columns.description: A descriptive text associated with the device.

columns.name: DvcId
columns.description: The unique ID of the device on which the event occurred or which reported the event.

columns.name: DvcIdType
columns.description: The type of DvcId.

columns.name: DvcMacAddr
columns.description: The MAC address of the device on which the event occurred or which reported the event.

columns.name: DvcZone
columns.description: The network on which the event occurred or which reported the event.

columns.name: DvcOs
columns.description: The operating system running on the device on which the event occurred or which reported the event.

columns.name: DvcOsVersion
columns.description: The version of the operating system on the device on which the event occurred or which reported the event.

columns.name: DvcAction
columns.description: For reporting security systems, the action taken by the system.

columns.name: DvcOriginalAction
columns.description: The original DvcAction as provided by the reporting device.

columns.name: DvcInterface
columns.description: The network interface on which data was captured.

columns.name: DvcScopeId
columns.description: The cloud platform scope ID the device belongs to. DvcScopeId map to a subscription ID on Azure and to an account ID on AWS.

columns.name: DvcScope
columns.description: The cloud platform scope the device belongs to. DvcScope map to a subscription ID on Azure and to an account ID on AWS.

columns.name: ActorUserId
columns.description: A machine-readable, alphanumeric, unique representation of the actor.

columns.name: ActorUserAadId
columns.description: The Azure Active Directory ID of the actor.

columns.name: ActorUserSid
columns.description: The Windows user ID (SIDs) of the actor.

columns.name: ActorUserIdType
columns.description: The type of the ID stored in the ActorUserId field.

columns.name: ActorScopeId
columns.description: The scope ID, such as Azure AD tenant ID, in which ActorUserId and ActorUsername are defined.

columns.name: ActorScope
columns.description: The scope, such as Azure AD tenant, in which ActorUserId and ActorUsername are defined.

columns.name: ActorUsername
columns.description: The Actor's username, including domain information when available.

columns.name: ActorUsernameType
columns.description: The type of the Actor's username specified in ActionUsername field

columns.name: ActorUserType
columns.description: The type of the Actor.

columns.name: ActorOriginalUserType
columns.description: The user type as reported by the reporting device.

columns.name: ActorSessionId
columns.description: The unique ID of the sign-in session of the Actor.

columns.name: TargetAppId
columns.description: The ID of the application to which the event applies, including a process, browser, or service.

columns.name: TargetAppName
columns.description: The name of the application to which event applies, including a service, a URL, or a SaaS application.

columns.name: TargetAppType
columns.description: The type of the application authorizing on behalf of the Actor.

columns.name: TargetOriginalAppType
columns.description: The target application type as reported by the reporting device.

columns.name: TargetUrl
columns.description: A URL associated with the target application.

columns.name: ActingAppId
columns.description: The ID of the application that initiated the activity reported, including a process, browser, or service.

columns.name: ActingAppName
columns.description: The name of the application that initiated the activity reported, including a service, a URL, or a SaaS application.

columns.name: ActingAppType
columns.description: The type of acting application.

columns.name: ActingOriginalAppType
columns.description: The acting application type as reported by the reporting device.

columns.name: HttpUserAgent
columns.description: When authentication is performed over HTTP or HTTPS, this field's value is the user_agent HTTP header provided by the acting application when performing the authentication.

columns.name: SrcIpAddr
columns.description: The Source IP address from which the connection or session originated.

columns.name: SrcPortNumber
columns.description: The Source IP port from which the connection originated.

columns.name: SrcHostname
columns.description: The source device hostname, excluding domain information.

columns.name: SrcDomain
columns.description: The domain of the source device.

columns.name: SrcDomainType
columns.description: The type of SrcDomain.

columns.name: SrcFQDN
columns.description: The source device hostname, including domain information when available.

columns.name: SrcDescription
columns.description: A descriptive text associated with the source device.

columns.name: SrcDvcId
columns.description: The ID of the source device.

columns.name: SrcDvcIdType
columns.description: The type of SrcDvcId.

columns.name: SrcDvcScopeId
columns.description: The cloud platform scope ID the source device belongs to. SrcDvcScopeId map to a subscription ID on Azure and to an account ID on AWS.

columns.name: SrcDvcScope
columns.description: The cloud platform scope the source device belongs to. SrcDvcScope map to a subscription ID on Azure and to an account ID on AWS.

columns.name: SrcDeviceType
columns.description: The type of the source device.

columns.name: SrcGeoCountry
columns.description: The country associated with the source IP address.

columns.name: SrcGeoLatitude
columns.description: The latitude of the geographical coordinate associated with the source IP address.

columns.name: SrcGeoLongitude
columns.description: The longitude of the geographical coordinate associated with the source IP address.

columns.name: SrcGeoRegion
columns.description: The region within a country associated with the source IP address.

columns.name: SrcGeoCity
columns.description: The city associated with the source IP address.

columns.name: SrcRiskLevel
columns.description: The risk level associated with the identified Source.

columns.name: SrcOriginalRiskLevel
columns.description: The risk level associaeted with the identified Source as reported by the reporting device.

columns.name: TargetIpAddr
columns.description: The Target IP address from which the connection or session originated.

columns.name: TargetPortNumber
columns.description: The Target IP port from which the connection originated.

columns.name: TargetHostname
columns.description: The target device hostname, excluding domain information.

columns.name: TargetDomain
columns.description: The domain of the target device.

columns.name: TargetDomainType
columns.description: The type of TargetDomain.

columns.name: TargetFQDN
columns.description: The target device hostname, including domain information when available.

columns.name: TargetDescription
columns.description: A descriptive text associated with the target device.

columns.name: TargetDvcId
columns.description: The ID of the target device.

columns.name: TargetDvcIdType
columns.description: The type of TargetDvcId.

columns.name: TargetDvcScopeId
columns.description: The cloud platform scope ID the target device belongs to. TargetDvcScopeId map to a subscription ID on Azure and to an account ID on AWS.

columns.name: TargetDvcScope
columns.description: The cloud platform scope the target device belongs to. TargetDvcScope map to a subscription ID on Azure and to an account ID on AWS.

columns.name: TargetDeviceType
columns.description: The type of the target device.

columns.name: TargetGeoCountry
columns.description: The country associated with the target IP address.

columns.name: TargetGeoLatitude
columns.description: The latitude of the geographical coordinate associated with the target IP address.

columns.name: TargetGeoLongitude
columns.description: The longitude of the geographical coordinate associated with the target IP address.

columns.name: TargetGeoRegion
columns.description: The region within a country associated with the target IP address.

columns.name: TargetGeoCity
columns.description: The city associated with the target IP address.

columns.name: TargetRiskLevel
columns.description: The risk level associated with the target.

columns.name: TargetOriginalRiskLevel
columns.description: The risk level associated with the target, as reported by the reporting device.

columns.name: TargetDvcOs
columns.description: The OS of the target device.

columns.name: Operation
columns.description: The operation audited as reported by the reporting device.

columns.name: ObjectId
columns.description: The name of the object on which the operation identified by EventType is performed.

columns.name: Object
columns.description: The name of the object on which the operation identified by EventType is performed.

columns.name: ObjectType
columns.description: The type of Object.

columns.name: OriginalObjectType
columns.description: The object type as reported by the reporting device.

columns.name: OldValue
columns.description: The old value of Object prior to the operation.

columns.name: NewValue
columns.description: The new value of Object after the operation was performed.

columns.name: ValueType
columns.description: The type of the old and new values.
